Room.Name: Main Courtyard Southeast
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the southeast corner of the main courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: This is an area reserved for the practice of small arms. Only blunt weapons and wooden swords are allowed in here, and at times it can get to be a real free-for-all. Several of the young squires and newly knighted warriors of the castle play a sort of king-of-the-hill, taking on all comers, and hoping to be the last standing when the game is over. To the north is a jousting alley, and to the west is the southern exit for the castle.
